participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and dedicated to helping others, with a strong sense of social justice.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, always looking for the next thrill on my skateboard.
participant_2.background: i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders. i have a broken arm.
